StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.name: [GetJoinsBySrc]
StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.body:
( @FromDate date.me, @ToDate date.me, @OrgUnitID int, @FY int--, -- @RecruiterID uniqueiden..er = null )
AS begin
declare @FYStartDt date.me declare @FYEndDt date.me select @FYStartDt = convert(date.me, cast(@FY-1 as varchar(4)) + '/10/1') --print @FYStartDt select @FYEndDt = convert(date.me, cast(@FY as varchar(4)) + '/09/30') --print @FYEndDt
select * into #JoinsTbl from dbo.RptDataAnalysisBySrc da where OrgId = @OrgUnitID and convert(date.me, cast(analysisyear as varchar(4)) + '/' + cast(analysismonth as varchar(2)) + '/15') between @FromDate and @ToDate
select * into #FYJoinsTbl from dbo.RptDataAnalysisBySrc da where OrgId = @OrgUnitID and convert(date.me, cast(analysisyear as varchar(4)) + '/' + cast(analysismonth as varchar(2)) + '/15') between @FYStartDt and @FYEndDt
select sum(LISJoin) LISJoin, sum(WKIJoin) WKIJoin, sum(CALJoin) CALJoin, sum(QLDJoin) QLDJoin, sum(IRRJoin) IRRJoin, sum(PWSJoin) PWSJoin, sum(TRAJoin) TRAJoin, sum(SEPJoin) SEPJoin, sum(MCRJoin) MCRJoin, sum(EACJoin) EACJoin, sum(SNSJoin) SNSJoin, sum(NPSJoin) NPSJoin, sum(RCRJoin) RCRJoin, sum(EMLJoin) EMLJoin, sum(OTHJoin) OTHJoin from #JoinsTbl union all select sum(LISJoin) LISJoin, sum(WKIJoin) WKIJoin, sum(CALJoin) CALJoin, sum(QLDJoin) QLDJoin, sum(IRRJoin) IRRJoin, sum(PWSJoin) PWSJoin, sum(TRAJoin) TRAJoin, sum(SEPJoin) SEPJoin, sum(MCRJoin) MCRJoin, sum(EACJoin) EACJoin, sum(SNSJoin) SNSJoin, sum(NPSJoin) NPSJoin, sum(RCRJoin) RCRJoin, sum(EMLJoin) EMLJoin, sum(OTHJoin) OTHJoin from #FyJoinsTbl
drop table #JoinsTbl drop table #FYJoinsTbl
end
